verbs.description: [V: habanero] [ARG1: apricot jam] this zippy and versatile jam was a blue - ribbon winner at our county fair i mix it with applesauce as a condiment for pork with cranberry sauce for poultry and with cream cheese as a spread on celery sticks it a beautiful color and in food news onemain financial services rda enthusiast brands apple s digest magazine customer service california editor partner america
